09:11 <imrg> Hi guys  
09:12 <imrg> Anyone got an example of settings up xwiki database connection through wildfly's (jboss) standalone.xml ?  
09:14 <imrg> I'm using a war deployment, and I've my connection ready in standalone.xml (datasource validated with admin UI)
